title: Holiday Planning and East Asian Font Shopping
content:
Submitted by [dan\_reynolds](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808144739/http:/typophile.com/user/1085 "View user profile.") : 11.Oct.2005 8.16am 

In the October 2005 LinoLetter from Linotype — Holiday Planning and East Asian Font Shopping! Check out the full version at Linotype’s website: [http://www.linotype.com/8-38-8-18953/issue200510.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808144739/http:/www.linotype.com/8-38-8-18953/issue200510.html "http://www.linotype.com/8-38-8-18953/issue200510.html").

Content Preview:  
This month, we would like to help you get ready for the holidays by presenting two products that can’t help but aid creativity — our new Xmas™ Com Fonts series, and the Kids Value Pack. Another new favorite of ours that we’d like to acquaint you with is the Bodebeck™ typeface, a re-cutting of timeless English lettering styles. Additionally this month, we are proud to introduce over 250 new East Asian fonts that have entered our library; these include fonts for the Chinese, Japanese, and Korean languages/writing systems. Rounding out this month’s report is information about our new magazine; published from time to time, the Linotype Matrix will keep you informed about the most up-to-date design trends, and how typefaces fit into them…

Have fonts of fun; view the complete LinoLetter [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808144739/http:/www.linotype.com/8-38-8-18953/issue200510.html)!
author: dan_reynolds
